You're already using Trello for project management! Integrating Mendeley with Trello can indeed create a powerful workflow for your thesis project. Here's how you can leverage both tools to streamline your research and writing process:

**Mendeley + Trello Integration:**

1. **Add Mendeley papers to Trello cards:** Create a Trello board for your thesis project and add cards for each paper or resource you're working with. Attach the corresponding Mendeley paper to each card, so you can access the paper and its annotations directly from Trello.
2. **Use Trello lists for organization:** Organize your Trello board into lists that mirror your Mendeley folders or tags. For example, you could have lists for "Literature Review," "Methodology," "Results," and "Discussion." This will help you track the progress of your research and writing.
3. **Add annotations and notes to Trello cards:** Use Trello's commenting feature to add notes, questions, or insights about each paper. This will help you to engage with the content and retain information better. You can also use this feature to create a to-do list for each paper, such as "Read and annotate" or "Summarize and integrate into literature review."
4. **Create a "To-Read" list in Trello:** Designate a list in Trello as your "To-Read" list, where you can add papers that you need to read and annotate. This will help you stay on top of your reading schedule and ensure that you're making progress on your literature review.
5. **Use Trello's calendar feature:** Use Trello's calendar feature to schedule tasks and deadlines for your thesis project. This will help you stay organized and ensure that you're meeting your milestones.
6. **Mendeley's citation plugin:** Mendeley offers a citation plugin for Word, LibreOffice, and other writing tools. This plugin allows you to easily insert citations and bibliographies into your thesis document, saving you time and effort.

**Benefits of integrating Mendeley and Trello:**

1. **Streamlined workflow:** By integrating Mendeley and Trello, you'll have a seamless workflow that takes you from research to writing to project management.
2. **Improved organization:** You'll be able to organize your papers, notes, and tasks in a way that makes sense for your research project.
3. **Enhanced collaboration:** If you're working with a team, Trello's collaboration features will allow you to share your board and cards with others, facilitating teamwork and feedback.
4. **Increased productivity:** By having all your resources and tasks in one place, you'll be able to work more efficiently and make the most of your time.

By integrating Mendeley and Trello, you'll create a powerful workflow that will help you stay organized, focused, and productive throughout your thesis project. Good luck!
